requests.response_body: {"data":[{"id":"1","type":"sortings","links":{"self":"http://example.org/api/rest/private/sortings/1"},"attributes":{"name":"LCR,Prio, ACD&ASR control","description":"Default dialpeer sorting method","use-static-routes":false}},{"id":"2","type":"sortings","links":{"self":"http://example.org/api/rest/private/sortings/2"},"attributes":{"name":"LCR, No ACD&ASR control","description":"Without ACD&ASR control","use-static-routes":false}},{"id":"3","type":"sortings","links":{"self":"http://example.org/api/rest/private/sortings/3"},"attributes":{"name":"Prio,LCR, ACD&ASR control","description":"Same as default, but priotity has more weight","use-static-routes":false}},{"id":"4","type":"sortings","links":{"self":"http://example.org/api/rest/private/sortings/4"},"attributes":{"name":"LCRD, Prio, ACD&ASR control","description":"Same as default, but take in account diff between costs","use-static-routes":false}},{"id":"5","type":"sortings","links":{"self":"http://example.org/api/rest/private/sortings/5"},"attributes":{"name":"name","description":null,"use-static-routes":false}}]}
